headline: Berkshire Hathaway (BRK.A): Assessing Valuation After a Steady 10% Year-to-Date Climb and Recent Pullback
summary: Berkshire Hathaway (BRK.A) has been quietly grinding higher this year, up about 10% year to date even after a recent pullback, and that kind of steady climb always invites a closer look. See our latest analysis for Berkshire Hathaway. The latest pullback, including a 1 day share price return of minus 1.4%, comes after a strong year to date share price return of just over 10%. The 5 year total shareholder return above 120% shows the long term compounding story is still very much intact, even...
